entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
